chart.name: x-bar vec4 (1)
chart.grid-space-desc: The very tricky part here is that for bar chart the grid y, z is exchanged in world.

Obj3.box-desc: in space grid scale; y is set with value (ignored)

bar.bars-desc: use this to define layer overlapping?

serials.docking-format: elements in same order of vectors, [[x, y, z], ...], where x, y, z are grid index
serials.docking-format2: in this example, x = xv, z = zv, y = 0, 1
